name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat

passive.name: Glance Back
passive.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
